caption:
“Divine love is a river without banks.”

Reflection:
Love flows beyond measure, carving its way through every heart. It cannot be contained, only received.

Commentary:
This reflection reminds us that divine love surpasses all boundaries. It moves freely, cleansing and carrying us toward unity.
